segments.text: Hello , what can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Um ... Hello , I would like to open an account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK ! What kind of account do you want to open ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to open a current account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will open it for you right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's the minimum deposit for opening a current account ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's 10 yuan . How much money do you want to deposit ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please write down your name , address and the amount of your deposit here . And please choose a passcode of six numbers and confirm it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Please confirm your information and sign your name in the blank .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Done ! What else should I do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's all . Here's your bank card , and here's the certificate of deposit . Bring your bank card with you every time you come to deposit or withdraw money .
segments.speaker: S1
